item.title: Stifel upgrades this lawn care product stock, sees more than 25% upside
item.description: Analyst W. Andrew Carter thinks investors may have underestimated the company's resiliency against macroeconomic pressures.

item.title: Tuesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 had its worst day since December as President Trump confirmed his tariffs would proceed. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Tuesday.

item.title: Correction risks: CBOE's volatility expert warns stock market is underpricing tariff impact
item.description: CBOE Global Markets' Mandy Xu contends the bond market has been more sensitive to economic uncertainty than stocks. But now, that gap may be starting ...

item.title: Stocks that are 'more insulated' from Trump's tariffs than their peers, according to Morgan Stanley
item.description: The forthcoming duties on Canada, China and Mexico, which are set to take effect on Tuesday, lingered over stocks to start the week.

item.title: Private credit is becoming more accessible to retail investors. What to know about this booming asset class
item.description: A new exchange-traded fund is bringing private credit to the masses and could open the door to more products following suit.
